channel.description: Recent content in packages on Alok's Blog

item.title: Useful Linux Packages
item.description: joe: to generate .gitignore files when needed joe g java,node,osx > .gitignore : create new gitignore joe g OSX,SublimeText » ~/.gitignore : appends to existing one joe ls : what tags can be used ledger ffsend: firefox send function hexyl: hex viewer tldr nemesis bed : binary editor builtwith site: to find what technology the site is using malc0de.com/database: search for malware thispersondoesnotexist.com – get a fake face generated.
